titleStmt.title: Reflections upon Coll. Sidney's Arcadia, the old cause being some observations upon his last paper, given to the sheriffs at his execution.
titleStmt.author: Nalson, John, 1638?-1686.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to John Nalson. cf. NUC pre-1956.
